item.description:
Hi guys,

This time around the game will be played at 3am Boston time so I am going to organise to watch a replay of the game on Sunday morning, probably starting around 9am.  If you would be interested in attending this event please RSVP ASAP so that I can get some idea of numbers, this will help in trying to lineup a venue.

Cheers,

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: RWC 2011 semi final: Wallabies vs All Blacks
